metadata.title: CVE-2022-44617 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in libXpm. When processing a file with width of 0 and avery large height, some parser functions will be called repeatedly and canlead to an infinite loop, resulting in a Denial of Service in theapplication linked to the library.

criterions.comment: libxpm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
motif: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
